blog.name: 0121_best_time_to_buy_and_sell_stock.md
blog.content:
# Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock

## Dscription

[doc](https://leetcode.com/problems/best-time-to-buy-and-sell-stock/)

## Solutions

### Fist Idea

```javascript
/**
 * @param {number[]} prices
 * @return {number}
 */
var maxProfit = function (prices) {
  let min = 0
  let maxProfit = 0

  for (let i = 1; i < prices.length; i++) {
    let profit = prices[i] - prices[min]
    maxProfit = Math.max(maxProfit, profit)
    min = profit < 0 ? i : min
  }

  return maxProfit
}
```
